title: Whereas several rolls inquisitions amd other matters of record which concern His Maiesties lordships, mannors, lands, tenements and hereditaments within this kingdom ... have been imbezelled ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, J. Roberts.
author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1669-1670 : Robartes)
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Samuel Dancer ...,
